comments.body: According to the Flow types, `viewport` should be nullable. The `| undefined` part can be removed if the props are declared to be optional

I'm not seeing the `viewport` property on the `Map` class as nullable: https://github.com/PaulLeCam/react-leaflet/blob/master/src/Map.js#L103.

`MapProps` has `viewport` as nullable though, which is consistent with what I'm seeing in the library: https://github.com/PaulLeCam/react-leaflet/blob/master/src/Map.js#L95
Yes, I think you're right. I mistook the property on MapProps for Map
